en: Used emails and phone calls to interact with clients in english
Made quotes and invoices for projects
Managed projects schedule and solved logistics problems
pt: Interagia com clientes em inglês através de ligações e emails
Fazia cotações e notas para os projetos
Gerenciava a agenda de projetos e ajudava a resolver problemas logísticos

en: Used Unity to develop a multiplayer browser game
Designed all systems and communications according to the expansive nature of the platform
Used FireBase products for backend and data storage
pt: Desenvolvi um jogo multiplayer para navegadores usando a Unity
Planejei todos os sistemas e comunicações de acordo com a natureza expansiva da plataforma
Usei produtos da FireBase para o backend e banco de dados

en: Developed 10+ static websites using React.js and Gatsby.js.
Heavy focus on SEO and conversion rate
Helped with the automation of the build and deploy pipeline.
pt: Desenvolvi mais de 10 sites estáticos usando React.js e Gatsby.js
Grande foco em SEO e taxa de conversões
Ajudei com a automatização das pipelines de build e deploy dos sites

assignments: Created an e-commerce website using Loja Integrada platform
Integrated the website with Facebook, Instagram, logistics provider and the ERP System
Working part-time to manage the sales flow, create ads for the products and make changes when necessary.
Created a website to show the results of several backgammon tournaments
Developed a solution with Google App Script to feed the information from Google Sheets directly to the website
Still working with the owner to make adjustments for new tournaments and improvements to the website
I made digital illustrations and animations to be used in games and advertising
Mostly pixel-art using Photoshop, but also used Illustrator and Krita
